item.title: Schindler's List (1993) (Top 100 Films)
item.description: Schindler's List title card with candles This is a film that is best experienced, not explained in a post like this. However, that being said, I'll give this a try anyhow. I've avoided this film all my life out of dread more than anything. It's somewhat weird then that I watched this so early in my “Top 100” films quest. I knew I'd have to watch it eventually anyhow.
